title: Chikkudukaya Talimpu/ Broad Beans Stir Fry || Side Dish || Lunch / Dinner
content:
Side Dish: Lunch - Rice / Dinner -¬†Chapathi/ Roti Servings - 4 Duration: 30 mins Curry is either wet/ dry prepared out of vegetables/ leafy vegetables. It should be cooked and make sure it contain some amount of nutrients in it for good health diet. In South India it's common recipe and should be a side dish in every meal, this Broad beans curry suits with any dal rice/ fresh hot rice with ghee if you like to have it with any phulka/ Roti then it's great combination üëç The masala ingredients which I used in this curry is basic for almost all vegetable curries. If you don't have so much time then ground coconut and green chillies paste together, store it in an airtight container and refrigerator then use on cooked veggies as and when required. It doesn't consume much time. This basic mild spicy masala goes well with French beans, carrots, lady's finger, Cluster beans etc., Nutrition facts: Broad Beans: Vitamins A,C & B6. Minerals iron, calcium, magnesium, potassium, fiber, sodium & protein Today I prepared Broad beans curry which is simple and obviously yummy üòã Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Broad Beans - 1/2 kg - chopped
  • Red onion / White Onion - 1 medium - chopped
  • Fresh grated coconut - 1/3 cup
  • Green chillies - 4
  • Salt - 1 1/2 tsp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Coriander leaves - 1/3 cup - chopped
For Tempering:
  • Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/2 tea spoon
  • Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon
  • Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1 tea spoon
  • Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1 tea spoon
  • Curry leaves - 4 to 5
  • Oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure: Prepreparation:
  • Wash broad beans twice under running water
  • Check the beans are clean and fresh
  • Chop them 1/2 inch size
  • Cook them on steam, add turmeric powder and 1/2 tsp salt for 20 mins
  • After 20 mins broad beans cooked well
Process of making Broad beans stir fry:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, tempering and onions
  • Saute 1 min
  • Meanwhile blend coconut & green chillies in mixer grinder
  • Keep it aside
  • Onions are tender and little bit crunchy
  • Now add cooked Broad beans
  • Saute and add grounded coconut paste & salt
  • Mix well and saute 2 mins
  • Turnoff heat and add chopped coriander leaves
  • Mix well and dish out
  • Serve Broad Beans stir fry with Dal rice/ Roti / Plain white rice / Brown rice
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day üòä
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust the spices according to taste
  • Broad beans you can cook in steam / pressure cook for 2 whistles
  • If you store in refrigerator, It will be good for 2 days
